text:
@DrDenaGrayson Analysis of sewage from 3 cities showed #COVID19 ALREADY in Italy in December BEFORE 1st reported case in #China. And may have been in China in Sept 19. It spread through the world before it was a known threat. 

They must TEST sewage NOW to see if this new swine flu is present
